5130.verse: ذَٲلِكَ|That|64|74|28$بِأَنَّهُمْ|(is) because [they]|149|168|607$شَآقُّواْ|they opposed|110|129|7175$ٱللَّهَ|Allah|53|72|184$وَرَسُولَهُۥ‌ۖ|and His Messenger.|148|167|3790$وَمَن|And whoever|106|116|1012$يُشَآقِّ|opposes|74|95|16770$ٱللَّهَ|Allah|53|95|1809$فَإِنَّ|then indeed,|103|145|599$ٱللَّهَ|Allah|53|95|184$شَدِيدُ|(is) severe|91|133|1445$ٱلْعِقَابِ|(in) penalty.|102|123|1746$

5131.verse: مَا|Whatever|84|94|262$قَطَعْتُم|you cut down|111|131|16771$مِّن|of|50|70|53$لِّينَةٍ|(the) palm-trees|130|150|16772$أَوْ|or|41|61|154$تَرَكْتُمُوهَا|you left them|113|133|16773$قَآئِمَةً|standing|76|86|10772$عَلَىٰٓ|on|63|75|52$أُصُولِهَا|their roots,|95|119|16774$فَبِإِذْنِ|it (was) by the permission|193|217|3475$ٱللَّهِ|(of) Allah,|86|110|2$وَلِيُخْزِىَ|and that He may disgrace|191|203|16775$ٱلْفَـٰسِقِينَ|the defiantly disobedient.|189|189|277$

5135.verse: وَٱلَّذِينَ|And those who|119|126|42$تَبَوَّءُو|settled|77|91|16787$ٱلدَّارَ|(in) the home|110|124|13529$وَٱلْإِيمَـٰنَ|and (accepted) faith|158|172|13780$مِن قَبْلِهِمْ|before them|107|121|1094$يُحِبُّونَ|love|84|91|7903$مَنْ|(those) who|101|113|76$هَاجَرَ|emigrated|85|109|16788$إِلَيْهِمْ|to them,|77|101|3030$وَلَا|and not|71|95|25$يَجِدُونَ|they find|87|111|4484$فِى|in|48|72|89$صُدُورِهِمْ|their breasts|113|125|6397$حَاجَةً|any want|82|99|9152$مِّمَّآ|of what|71|105|216$أُوتُواْ|they were given|127|161|940$وَيُؤْثِرُونَ|but prefer|111|145|16789$عَلَىٰٓ|over|63|97|52$أَنفُسِهِمْ|themselves,|99|116|1025$وَلَوْ|even though|103|122|179$كَانَ|was|57|95|913$بِهِمْ|with them|86|124|125$خَصَاصَةٌ‌ۚ|poverty.|110|148|16790$وَمَن|And whoever|106|144|1012$يُوقَ|is saved|74|93|16791$شُحَّ|(from) stinginess|131|144|16792$نَفْسِهِۦ|(of) his soul,|104|129|3094$فَأُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ|then those|92|117|777$هُمُ|[they]|62|87|56$ٱلْمُفْلِحُونَ|(are) the successful ones.|195|208|57$

5130.verse: That is because they opposed Allah and His Messenger. And whoever opposes Allah - then indeed, Allah is severe in penalty.

5131.verse: Whatever you have cut down of [their] palm trees or left standing on their trunks - it was by permission of Allah and so He would disgrace the defiantly disobedient.

5132.verse: And what Allah restored [of property] to His Messenger from them - you did not spur for it [in an expedition] any horses or camels, but Allah gives His messengers power over whom He wills, and Allah is over all things competent.

5133.verse: And what Allah restored to His Messenger from the people of the towns - it is for Allah and for the Messenger and for [his] near relatives and orphans and the [stranded] traveler - so that it will not be a perpetual distribution among the rich from among you. And whatever the Messenger has given you - take; and what he has forbidden you - refrain from. And fear Allah; indeed, Allah is severe in penalty.

5134.verse: For the poor emigrants who were expelled from their homes and their properties, seeking bounty from Allah and [His] approval and supporting Allah and His Messenger, [there is also a share]. Those are the truthful.

5135.verse: And [also for] those who were settled in al-Madinah and [adopted] the faith before them. They love those who emigrated to them and find not any want in their breasts of what the emigrants were given but give [them] preference over themselves, even though they are in privation. And whoever is protected from the stinginess of his soul - it is those who will be the successful.
